items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: Delivery was right on time and the dress arrived in perfect condition! The seller even allowed me to make some alterations in order to make the dress customizable to my size. I LOVE the shoulder sleeves, everybody was complimenting it! I am SO glad I chose this dress. Just needed to be steamed beforehand AND the day of the wedding because it crinkles very easily, but that’s to be expected with most wedding dresses. So make sure you save time to steam it the same day. Other than that it was perfect! Read more
items.author: Pinky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Dress
items.body: I’m 5’2” weight 147 lbs. with DDs and I bought a size ten. I went off the one review on here for this dress but the dress was falling off me. Way too big in the chest. I took it to a seamstress and she added straps and hemmed the bottom. Then it fit beautifully. Dress is gorgeous as it shows in the picture… very soft flowing elegant material. Does tie up the back, be careful the tie does loosen itself. Read more
items.author: Stacy B.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: This was a gift and she loved it. Great value for the money. Fits true to size. Great quality. Stretchy Read more
items.author: Ninnahhh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great.
items.body: I ordered a size 8. I’m 5’3”, 138 lbs, and 34DD. My stomach is flat and I wear a size 28 jean. I normally wear 4-6 US clothing. The dress fits tightly but well. I needed the length shortened but that was it. Read more
items.author: Cheree L Millikan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Talle al cuerpo
items.body: Lo ame, no se transparenta nada y talla espectacular Read more
items.author: Lydia Adams.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size up
items.body: Love it!! Only thing I recommend is getting a size up. I normally wear a 14 and am 186 pounds and 5’5 in height, but I went up a size and it fits perfectly!! I definitely recommend it though! It’s so beautiful! Read more
items.author: Jess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dress
items.author: Alissa Chow

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Style S-white, Style G-white, Style S-ivory, Style G-ivory, Style Q-white, Style Q-ivory, Style L-white, Style L-ivory, Style O-ivory, Style B-ivory, Style E-ivory, Style B-white, Style E-white, Style O-white. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
